price: Na wanapo ambiwa: Msujudieni Arrahman! Wao husema: Ni nani Arrahman? Je! Tumsujudie unaye tuamrisha wewe tu? Na huwazidishia chuki.
arabic: وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمُ ٱسۡجُدُواْۤ لِلرَّحۡمَٰنِ قَالُواْ وَمَا ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنُ أَنَسۡجُدُ لِمَا تَأۡمُرُنَا وَزَادَهُمۡ نُفُورٗا۩
footnotes: Na wakiambiwa hawa makafiri: Mnyenyekeeni Arrahmani, Mwingi wa Rehema, na mumuabdu, wao husema: Nani huyo Arrahmani? Sisi hatumjui, hata tumsujudie. Basi tukufuate amri yako tu? Na wanazidi kuwa mbali na kutengeka na Imani.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wa-idhā qīla lahumu us'judū lilrraḥmāni qālū wamā al-raḥmānu anasjudu limā tamurunā wazādahum nufūran
